title: Dr. J.I. France
summary: Photograph shows Republican politician Joseph Irwin France (1873-1939) who served as U.S. Senator from Maryland (1917-1923). (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2014)
notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative.
Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress).

title: Handy peach orchard, Patrick County, Virginia
notes: Index data: 1-6, R.W.Handy and his son look over the morning's lugs of peaches lifted from the Handy Orchards near Woolwine, VA; 7-17, Misc. photos around the Handy Orchards and retail buying stand on highway; 8, in Patrick Co.
medium: 35 mm color slide
source_collection: Blue Ridge Parkway Folklife Project collection, 1977-1981 (AFC 1982/009)
repository: American Folklife Center

title: W.R. Stewart Jr. -- Mrs. C. Dillingham, Richard Peters & Pavlowa
summary: Photograph shows Russian ballerina Anna Pavlova (1881-1931) with William Rhinelander Stewart Jr.; Mrs. Charles Dillingham, wife of theater director and owner Charles Bancroft Dillingham and Richard Peters. Stewart, Dillingham, and Peters are on ice skates.(Source: Flickr Commons project, 2015)
